name: Invasion Scraper (ODJ 08.08.)
description:
Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Use mouse or number buttons (1-5) to upgrade and repair.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made in less than ~16h over the course of 3 days as a part of my own declared challenge: One Day Jam (kinda failed the one-day part). The goal of ODJ is to create a simple game in one day with a time budget of 8-9h. I did not succeed this time

Extra rules for ODJ that I follow:

  • One scene - no multiple levels, just one screen;
  • No music, sound, effects, options - this saves time and I'm lazy;
  • Very simple game idea - simple enough to port to mobile without adding onscreen joysticks and button clusters [failed];
  • Use Unity or any high-level game engine - saves a bit of time :)

This is my 5th ODJ and I plan to do more of these. That's why this one is dated 08.08.
